************************************************************************
* File 560 is primarily JCL which can be used as examples for executing*
* the assembler, C, and COBOL programs in files 558, 559, and 563.     *
* Each JCL member name in the list below is followed by the names of   *
* the programs executed in each of its steps.                          *
*                                                                      *
* The file containing the executed program is shown in parentheses as  *
* (FILE558), (FILE559), or (FILE563) when it is in one of those        *
* libraries. Other programs are utilities or vendor software:          *
*                                                                      *
* IBM Programs: ADRDSSU  AMASPZAP AMBLIST  ASMA90   CBCDRVR  DFSRRC00  *
*               DSNHPC   EDCPRLK  GIMSMP   HEWL     ICKDSF   IDCAMS    *
*               IEBCOPY  IEBGENER IEBUPDTE IEFBR14  IEHLIST  IEHPROGM  *
*               IEV90    IEWL     IFCDIP00 IFCEREP1 IGYCRCTL IKFCBL00  *
*               IKJEFT01 IKJEFT1A IMASPZAP IPOUPDTE ISRSUPC  SUPERZAP  *
*                                                                      *
* Compuware's XPEDITER: ADSIR500 CWPAMAIN (can be replaced with an     *
*               assembler step).                                       *
*                                                                      *
* Compuware's XPEDITER: ADSIR200 ADSIR300 CWPCMAIN (can be replaced    *
*               with a COBOL compile step).                            *
*                                                                      *
* C.A.'s Optimizer: CPXUPTSM (can be replaced with a COBOL compile step*
*                                                                      *
* C.A.'s Endevor: NDVRC1 (a utility program).                          *
*                                                                      *
* Edge Information Group's EPA: (a load module analyzer program).      *
*                                                                      *
* Ascent Solutions' PKUNZIP  PKZIP: (file decompression, compression). *
*                                                                      *
* Syncsort's SORT     SORT33: (a file sort program).                   *
************************************************************************

DFDSSDOC.text:
****** DFDSS JCL DIRECTORY ******
NOTES:
  (1) MIGRATED DATASETS ARE BYPASSED - BE SURE ALL ARE PRESENT
  (2) TO FIND CATALOG CONTAINING AN ALIAS:
      LISTC ENT('HIGHLEVELNODE') ALIAS ALL CAT('MASTERCATALOGDSNAME')
  (3) TO COPY TO A DIFFERENT DSNAME: RENUNC(OLD.DSNAME,NEW.DSNAME)
  (4) CANNOT RENAME VSAM CLUSTERS ON PHYSICAL RESTORE
  (5) CANNOT RENAME FILE IF NEWNAME EXISTS ON DASD
  (6) EXCLUDE SYS1.VVDS.**, FDRABR.** FILES IF RENAMING ALL DATASETS

COPYGBRG: COPY FILES USING DFDSS TO A 3490 CARTRIDGE.

COPYNETM: COPY THE NETMAN FILES TO VOLUME Y2K002 AND CATALOG THEM IN
          THE SYS1.CAT.Y2K006 CATALOG.

COPYTSO:  COPY MY TSO DATASETS TO THE Y2K LPAR SYSTEM AND CATALOG THEM
          IN THE SYS1.CAT.Y2K005 CATALOG.

DFDSSDIR: PRINT A DIRECTORY OF ALL DATASETS FROM A DFDSS DUMP.

RSTRGBRG: RESTORE SELECTED FILES FROM LOGICAL DUMP TAPE AND RENAME

SAVEPDSS: SAVE MY PDS'S TO A CARTRIDGE.

//         SPACE=(TRK,(90,15),RLSE)

USING 000000 00007B F P 000000

EASYIMS.text:
//BC0THORD JOB (1152002-9800039,,TMVS01-UR-XXXX),'DTHORNTON',CLASS=V,
//   MSGCLASS=Y,NOTIFY=BC0THOR,REGION=4M
//JESOUT OUTPUT GROUPID=02A,DEFAULT=YES,JESDS=ALL,
//   PAGEDEF=GRYBIG,FORMDEF=GRYBIG
//*******************************************************************
//*                 BC0THOR.PDS.JCL(EASYIMS)                        *
//* EASYTRIEVE PLUS/IMS JOB                                         *
//*******************************************************************
//DLIBATCH PROC MBR=TEMPNAME,PSB=,BUF=8,SPIE=0,TEST=0,EXCPVR=0,
//         RST=0,PRLD=,SRCH=0,CKPTID=,MON=N,LOGA=0
//         EXEC PGM=DFSRRC00,REGION=4096K,
//       PARM=(DLI,&MBR,&PSB,&BUF,
//             &SPIE&TEST&EXCPVR&RST,&PRLD,&SRCH,&CKPTID,&MON,&LOGA)
//STEPLIB  DD DSN=PROD.LOAD,DISP=(SHR,PASS)
//DFSRESLB DD DSN=SYS1.IMSVS.RESLIB,DISP=SHR
//IMS      DD DSN=IMSVS.PSBLIB,DISP=SHR
//         DD DSN=IMSVS.DBDLIB,DISP=SHR
//EZTVFM   DD UNIT=DISK,SPACE=(4096,(100,100))
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=Y
//REPORT01 DD SYSOUT=Y
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=Y
//SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=(Y,,DUMP)
// PEND
//DLIBATCH EXEC DLIBATCH,MBR=EZTPA00,PSB=RPSBREAD
//RDSCUR00 DD DSN=IMSDB.CHIPS.RDSCUR00,DISP=SHR
//DFSVSAMP DD DSN=TEST.SORTCARD(VSAMDEBY),DISP=SHR
//IEFRDER  DD DUMMY,DCB=(RECFM=VBS,LRECL=1916,BLKSIZE=1920)
//OUTT  DD DSN=BC0THOR.TSTT.CHIPADJ,UNIT=DISK,
//   DCB=(LRECL=0080,BLKSIZE=00000,RECFM=FB),DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//   SPACE=(CYL,(03,01),RLSE)
//SYSIN    DD  *
 LIST ON
 PARM LIST (NOPARM FILE)
FILE RDSCUR00 DLI(RDSCUR00)
RECORD CSSCUR00 222 KEY(RECTYP 1 1)
RECTYP                 1 1 A
ADJNUM                 5 4 B HEADING('ADJUSTER' 'NUMBER')
ADJ2                   W 8 N
ADJ3             ADJ2 +4 4 N
PASSWORD              11 8 A HEADING('ADJUSTER' 'PASSWORD')
PASS4                 11 4 A
ROUTE                  9 2 B
LOC                 19 2 A HEADING('LOCATION' 'CODE')
AH1                 21 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '1')
AH2                 22 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '2')
AH3                 23 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '3')
AH4                 24 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '4')
AH5                 25 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '5')
AH6                 26 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '6')
AH7                 27 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '7')
AH8                 28 1 A HEADING('A' 'H' '8')
EFFDT                 33 4 B
CANCDT                37 4 B
LADT                  41 4 B
BCPAY                 45 4 B HEADING('BC' 'MAX' 'PAY' 'IP')
BCPOUT                49 4 B HEADING('BC' 'MAX' 'PAY' 'OP')
BSPAY                 53 4 B HEADING('BS' 'MAX' 'PAY')
SUBPAY                57 4 B HEADING('SUB' 'MAX' 'PAY')
JOBCD                 62 3 A
COST                  65 2 A
CST2                COST 1 A
FNM                   85 10 A
FNMLST                94 1 A
LNAME                 95 15 A
LNAME6                95 6 A
MDROP                111 3 A
EXCHANGE             117 3 A
PHONE                120 4 A HEADING ('ADJUSTER' 'PHONE')
*************************************************************
FILE OUTT FB (00080 00000)
FILEHEADING            1 60 A
ADJNUM                 1 8 N HEADING('ADJUSTER' 'NUMBER')
LNAME                 15 15 A
FNM                   32 10 A
MDROP                 44 3 A
PHONE                 49 4 A HEADING ('ADJUSTER' 'PHONE')
ROUTE                 55 4 N
*************************************************************
FILE REPORT01 PRINTER
JOB INPUT RDSCUR00
RETRIEVE RDSCUR00 SELECT (CSSCUR00)
ADJ2 = ADJNUM
 IF RECORD-COUNT EQ 1
    OUTT:FILEHEADING = +
       'ADJUSTER      LAST NAME        1ST NAME    DRP  PHONE ROUTE '
    PUT OUTT
    OUTT:FILEHEADING = +
       '========      ===============  ==========  ===  ====  ====  '
    PUT OUTT
 END-IF
 IF CANCDT GE 971101
*IF AH2 GE '2'
*IF COST EQ 'PH'
** PRINT CAR-RPT
   MOVE LIKE RDSCUR00 TO OUTT
   PUT OUTT
*END-IF
*END-IF
 END-IF

**************************************************************
REPORT CAR-RPT PRINTER REPORT01 SPACE 2
SEQUENCE COST LNAME FNM ADJNUM
CONTROL COST NEWPAGE
TITLE 1 'TRIGON INS CO - CORP.AUD - CHIPS ADJUSTERS REPORT'
*ITLE 1 'LIST OF CHIPS SECURITY ADMINISTRATORS'
TITLE 2 'SORTED BY COST CENTER, NAME, AND ADJUSTER'
TITLE 3 'COST CENTER FOR THIS PAGE IS:  ' COST
LINE 1  LNAME FNM ADJNUM MDROP ROUTE PHONE
*INE 1  LNAME FNM ADJNUM MDROP ROUTE AH1 AH2 AH3 AH4 AH5 AH6 AH7 AH8
//

RELINKA2.text:
//BC0THORI JOB (1152002-9800039,,TMVS01-UR-XXXX),'DTHORNTON',CLASS=V,
//   MSGCLASS=Y,NOTIFY=BC0THOR,REGION=104M
//JESOUT OUTPUT GROUPID=HDQTRSF2,DEFAULT=YES,JESDS=ALL,
//   PAGEDEF=GRYBIG,FORMDEF=GRYBIG
//*******************************************************************
//*          BC0THOR.PDS.JCL(RELINKA2)                              *
//* THIS IS ONE OF FOUR JOBS USED TO RELINK ALL THE MEMBERS IN THE  *
//* ENDEVOR CONTROLLED LOAD LIBRARIES INTO NEW LIBRARIES, REPLACING *
//* ALL COBOL LIBRARY SUBROUTINES (IGZ..., ILBO...) WITH THE        *
//* EQUIVALENT MEMBER FROM CEE.SCEELKED.                            *
//* THIS JOB RELINKS SEVERAL PROGRAMS THAT WERE COMPILED USING THE  *
//* NORES COBOL2 COMPILE OPTION SO THAT THE PROPER LE ROUTINES WILL *
//* BE INCLUDED IN THE MODULE. THE REPLACE OPTION IS NEEDED HERE,   *
//* AS MANY IGZ MODULES ARE REPLACED BY CEE MODULES.                *
//* THE THREE PROGRAMS ARE: DVC5600P, RP473A00, AND RP484A00        *
//*******************************************************************
//LKED   EXEC  PGM=IEWL,PARM='CALL,LIST=OFF,LET'
//SYSUT1   DD  UNIT=DISK,SPACE=(1024,(200,20))
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//OLDLIB   DD  DISP=SHR,DSN=EMVSP.OUTPUT.LOADLIB
//SYSLIB   DD  DISP=SHR,DSN=CEE.SCEELKED
//SYSLMOD  DD  DSN=EMVSP.NEWOUT.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSLIN   DD  *
 REPLACE IGZENRT
 REPLACE IGZCSPA
 REPLACE IGZCDSP
 REPLACE IGZEQOC
 REPLACE IGZEMSG
 REPLACE IGZCXFR
 REPLACE IGZCULE
 REPLACE IGZEQBL
 REPLACE ILBOABN
 REPLACE IGZEBST
 REPLACE IGZENRI
 REPLACE IGZEABX
 REPLACE IGZEABN
 REPLACE IGZEPRM
 REPLACE IGZESTA
 REPLACE IGZESAT
 REPLACE IGZCTCO
 REPLACE IGZCCCO
 REPLACE IGZETUN
 REPLACE IGZCMSF
 REPLACE IGZCMST
 REPLACE IGZCBID
 REPLACE IGZESPM
 REPLACE IGZEOUT
 REPLACE IGZCONV
 REPLACE IGZCONVX
 REPLACE IGZCCVB
 REPLACE IGZECMS
 REPLACE IGZCSSN
 REPLACE IGZESNP
 REPLACE IGZEOPD
 INCLUDE OLDLIB(DVC5600P)
 ORDER   DVC5600P
 ENTRY   DVC5600P
 NAME    DVC5600P(R)
 REPLACE IGZENRT

RELNKCEE.text:
//BC0THORD JOB (1152002-9800039,,TMVS01-UR-XXXX),'DTHORNTON',CLASS=V,
//   MSGCLASS=Y,NOTIFY=BC0THOR,REGION=104M
//JESOUT OUTPUT GROUPID=02A,DEFAULT=YES,JESDS=ALL,
//   PAGEDEF=GRYBIG,FORMDEF=GRYBIG
//*******************************************************************
//*               BC0THOR.PDS.JCL(RELNKCEE)                         *
//* RELINK A VS COBOL NORES PROGRAM USING CEE.SCEELKED              *
//* THIS IS THE MOST INCLUSIVE SITUATION, AND WILL WORK FOR ALL     *
//* VERSIONS OF COBOL AND RES/NORES.                                *
//* BASED ON CEE.SCEESAMP(IGZWRLKC)                                 *
//*******************************************************************
//********************************************************************
//*                                                                  *
//*  RELINK A LOAD MODULE THAT CONTAINS BOTH OS/VS COBOL PROGRAMS    *
//*  AND VS COBOL II PROGRAMS WITH LANGUAGE ENVIRONMENT.             *
//*                                                                  *
//********************************************************************
//*
//********************************************************************
//*  CHANGE THE PARM STATEMENT BELOW AS NECESSARY.                   *
//********************************************************************
//*
//LINK   EXEC  PGM=IEWL,PARM='LIST,MAP,XREF,RENT,REUS'
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSLIB   DD  DSN=CEE.SCEELKED,DISP=SHR
//LOADLIB  DD  DSN=ECC.TST.V.CICSC.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSLMOD  DD  DSN=BC0THOR.LOAD.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSUT1   DD  UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2)),DISP=NEW
//SYSLIN   DD  *
  REPLACE IGZCACP
